scripts.prepare-ui-component: cd ui-components && npm i && npm run build && npm run pack-package
scripts.prepare-all: npm run prepare-server && npm run prepare-cart && npm run prepare-catalog && npm run prepare-layout && npm run prepare-reviews && npm run prepare-ui-component
scripts.start-all: concurrently "npm run run-layout" "npm run run-catalog" "npm run run-cart" "npm run run-reviews" "npm run run-server"
scripts.start-without-server: concurrently "npm run run-layout" "npm run run-catalog" "npm run run-cart" "npm run run-reviews"
